name: nonperishable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Nonperishable food does not decay quickly: You can help the victims of the disaster by making a donation of nonperishable food. Every person who comes to the centre is given a bag full of nonperishable goods. Related word
perishable
More examplesFewer examplesAll our stores have large bins where customers can donate nonperishable items.Cafés and restaurants have been stocking up on nonperishable items.This food is non-perishable and can be kept for a long time in a cool, dark place.
